website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, supportive shoes for those who need to be on their feet all day.
pros: Comes in Black (Zappos), Midnight Navy, Deep Plum, Hot Cherry, Pagoda Blue and Indian Green (Amazon)
Faux Patent Leather upper, antibacterial microfiber lining, triple-density EVA midsole
Textured outsole with embossed FitFlop logo
Heel measures 2 inches, platform measures 1 inch
cons: May run wide, also may run large

customer_reviews.title: and stuck with shoes that I will not wear. How disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Love fitflop brand shoes, but these are awful. I have worn these may be five times and the patent leather is cracking on both sides on the tops of the shoes. Since I am past my return window, I am unable to return them and stuck with shoes that I will not wear. How disappointing
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, same cozy footbed that my feet adore
customer_reviews.text: Pros: runs wide, comfortable, same cozy footbed that my feet adore. Great in the rain. Cons: fits a tad shorter than the sandal styles. Upper doesn't breathe well enough to wear sockless all day. I'll keep these, they are useful.
customer_reviews.author: daisy_miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Clarks, Sketchers and FitFlops for years. Unfortunately, I've started experiencing foot and ankle pain with just about every shoe I own...except my FitFlops. The podiatrist says no more walking around barefoot...even at home and to get prescription inserts. Well, phooey! Since I needed something other than a sandal for winter I opted to buy some new FitFlops instead of inserts for my other shoes. These fit the bill. Same comfort level as the sandals. Fit perfectly. Will definitely be buying more FitFlops.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Petillo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical ecxercise cure for my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true 10.5 US I often have to go a size up to get the shoes I want since many shoes are not available in womens half sizes. However all my open fitflops a (incl. mules) comfortably fit me in a size 10. I bought these patent mules in a size 10 US too. They do not feel like they have an arch support but somehow help with my plantar fasciitis and I have high arches. They also get better with "age" conforming more to your foot. I love to wear them with light cushioning acrylic socks for up to 4 hours since they can get sweaty with the patent style.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny T

customer_reviews.title: Zero flexibility!
customer_reviews.text: I love FitFlops. However these are just awful. I can’t wear them. There is zero give on the top of the band as there is no elastic or flexibility over the top of your foot. Wore them for 2 hours and they actually gave me black and blue bruises from the tight leather. If you have a high arch do not get these.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet and my sifts are long. I have tried many different clogs. These Fitflops, are to me, the best I have purchased. I use to use the Dansko clogs, they are good but on the heavy side. These Fitflops are light with a great arch support. After being scrubbed for hours on my feet, my legs are rested, my feet doesn’t hurt, and I am definitely hooked on these Fitflops.
customer_reviews.author: Superwoman

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have been able to find for working my 12 hour days as a nurse. My feet don't get tired nor do they hurt. My feet do get a bit sweaty but not to the point I have to change socks. I will be ordering more of these in additional colors. I get compliments on the "shiny" black material just about everyday from patients. I'm able to wipe them off and they look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: P. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: My $90 shoes I love to look at...but not wear
customer_reviews.text: I thought these shoes/clogs were super cute and was willing to pay the $90 price tag. I was so excited to get them! The first time or two wearing them I liked them. Yet, Ivery only worn them a couple times after that. The reason why is because they seem to slip easily. They want to slide off my feet and I have to curl my toes to grip the shoe. Also, the top of the shoe hits the top of my foot as I walk and that's annoying (because I'm already curling my toes to keep the darn things from flopping off my feet). Geez I hate these cute things.
customer_reviews.author: cathlene

customer_reviews.title: New Favoirites
customer_reviews.text: I have worn FitFlops sandals most of the summer, and absolutely love them, so I thought I would try a pair of clogs for the cooler weather, which finally arrived. I had no problems adjusting to the clogs, and they really look good. It's a good idea to slowly adjust to these shoes, but I wear them all day, and am on my feet a lot. I have worn FitFlops during a 2-mile, up and down hill walk with my dogs numerous times, and the firm, supportive, cushioning is great. BTW, I am a pretty fit 66-year old, not exactly a spring chicken! I love some comfort and reliability with my style!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No nerve endings pain in these classy-looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! The patent leather gives the shoe a more professional look. They fit perfectly as expected, however, I have a wide foot and bought the "b/m" because they did not offer a wide. I am glad I did, but a person with a narrow foot will likely find these shoes too wide u less wearing thick socks. This is my fourth pair of fitflops, my 2nd pair of closed toe, and thonly shoes I can wear that do not hurt my feet! The Fitflops technogy releases my heel pain and nerve damage pain in the ball of my foot. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes. Might Reconsider Getting Red Next Time
customer_reviews.text: Love to run errands in these. I got the red pair because I thought they were cute and different. I get a lot of attention...maybe because they look like clown shoes. Maybe I should have gotten another color like black or something. Oh well! LOL! But those who stare, do not know what they are missing. These are so comfortable. I love them regardless of their Ronald McDonald-like style.
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love fitflops.
customer_reviews.text: I love fitflops.... I have purchased at least l5 pairs in the past 10 years ..... these shuv shoes literally fell apart. The high gloss coating rolled back and peeled off. I was so disappointed. I think they have discontinued making them and are selling the ones they have left... they are so cute but they don't stay cute for long
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fitflops!
customer_reviews.text: I am using fitflops' for a few years but these pair is the best I have had ! They are very comfortable and my feet have enough room inside beautifully! The color is very special and although I bought them last year- I started to use them 2 weeks ago! I always like to have a new pair standby...I surely buy another pair like this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rimona Rotem

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but the patent leather cracked the first time I wore them. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trafalgar, IN

customer_reviews.title: Top of shoe leaves indents on the top of my foot
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoe leaves a nice indentation on the top of my foot. Would consider that I purchased the wrong size however, if I got a larger size, there is no way my foot would fit into it. I've had these shoes for about 6 month and nothing has changed. Same issue with my Danskos as I wear them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT expect them to fit like FitFlops
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back, despite ordering the same size that fits me just fine in 3 other kinds of FFs. The color is lovely and the cushioning feels pretty much in line with other FFs, but the toe box is TINY. Normally I have plenty of extra room for thick socks and toe wiggling, but even trying on barefoot it's snug in the toes. If other FFs are too big/wide for you in that area, this might be a good choice for you, but if you're looking at these because you like the fit of the other FitFlops in your collection, walk on by and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bree D.

customer_reviews.title: This shoes a runs little big but is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable this shoe is. When the weather is better I wear them as my daily go to pair of shoes. I slip them on and I know I can go all day in comfort and the color adds some pizzazz to my wardrobe. This is the second time I've bought this shoe and it's the 3rd pair of fitflops I own right now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Yet again, very satisfied with Fitflop!
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE fan of Fitflop. I have many different styles. I even bought a pair of sandals to wear as slippers in my house in summer. Another pair of sandals I wore when hiking...I know! So, when I saw these pair, I just had to get them for work (working at a surgery center on my feet for 10 hours). Very happy to say that, once again, Fitflop came through proving they are truly very comfortable and long lasting shoe brand. After a long shift, my feet are not tired at all. Easy to slip on, slip off, with great rubber grip for the O.R. floors.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My FitFlops are by far the best work shoes I have ever wore in my 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Fitflop mules. I am an OR nurse that works12 hour shifts. I'm on my feet all day either scrubbing or circulating. My FitFlops are by far the best work shoes I have ever wore in my 9 years of being a nurse. My first pair of FitFlops lasted a year before the sides started to break down. I'm only giving this pair 3 stars because they have only lasted me FOUR months. The material is starting to crack and I'm getting cramps in my left foot. I'm not sure why unless they were not a true Fitflop brand???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe; I could not live without
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe; I could not live without ... Former ballet dancer, currently nursing a foot injury. Take care of your feet! I wear these as my everyday shoes, easy to slip on and off. The front of the shoe is properly shaped to allow your toes to spread out naturally, sooo comfortable. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable fit flop mule
customer_reviews.text: This mule is very comfortable . I originally bought it for work since i had been having lots of foot pain for being on my feet all day. I have spent so many dollars on different brand shoes but nothing really gave me comfort until i found this. Because of it's comfort i use it all the time even during vacations. I would want to buy more pairs in different colors if the price is right. At present it's almost $100, I wish the price would go lower. But i would highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: ❤️ l wore my shoes for the first time, eight hrs, at work and Standing the entire time.The shoes were bought to replace A pair of $ 200+ clogs that due to their weight ,were aggravating my torn meniscus. These clogs not only offer support but are light in weightl,there by, not tiring your feet or aggravating an already aggravated knee.Very pleased with this purchase and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great color and super comfortable. I keep them at work (I'm a nurse) and they are great for all day wear. My only minor complaint is that they're kind of hot. It's not surprising I suppose since they're patent leather clogs, but I'm a little on the hot natured side and I HATE for my feet to be hot. When it happens, I just change shoes for awhile. That's really not a criticism of the shoes, but it's something to keep in mind if you don't like super warm feet.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Durden

customer_reviews.title: Shut patent mule in black
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is true...I take an 8 in other shoes, and the 8 in the shuv patent mule fits. My feet are on the wider side, so FitFlops have room for my wide foot. These shoes are very shiny. I probably wouldn't like that except that I wear them to work (I'm a nurse), so shiny is OK. They're comfortable enough to wear for a 12-hour shift without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Louella

customer_reviews.title: Fitflops are consistent
customer_reviews.text: I like fiflops and have a few pairs. The fit is true to size, and I wear a 9m. My heel stops right at the edge of the open heel, and my toes fit comfortably in the toe box. The only thing I have noticed with these is the shoe rubs my left big toe nail. Not enough for discomfort though. These don't have the give the felt, suede or leather have, but still are comfortable. The color is nice and bright too!
customer_reviews.author: D L Hampshire

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to imagine a more comfortable shoe than the FitFlop Shuv! The quality, design and fit are superb, as well as attractive! I was concerned that they might look clunky, but they are so cute, shiny, waterproof and look a bit like boots when worn with pants. Although they are expensive, I expect to have they for many years. Because Amazon Prime offers free returns and you receive merchandise within two days, I would not hesitate to buy another pair of FitFlops.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe -
customer_reviews.text: Good support - I love Fitflops. The top lip of the shoe aggravated the top of my foot a bit during first couple of times wearing, but that has gone away. Finish durable and resistant to scuffs. Comfortable all day - and I am on my feet most of the time. Size 8 fit as expected - in relation to two other FitFlops I own. I would say the sole seems a bit harder and stiffer than my flip flop sandals from the summer or slip ons ordered earlier this fall.
customer_reviews.author: acap123

customer_reviews.title: Worn them for the last seven years for work!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable clog that I know. have bought the same brand and worn for the last seven years! my feet are happy after standing and walking all day in them. To all nurses out there, you might want to try fitflop mules/clogs for your day to day use especially on those hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fitflops are the few brands that i can wear with these arthritic feet. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: very comfy...
customer_reviews.text: I got a different one from the picture it has a purple inside and already for 2 years it makes my socks and tights purple.. make sure it has the leather inside! but its still amazing and comfy its just a little annoying when you foot gets purple...
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: 20 percent restocking fee.
customer_reviews.text: Careful of 20 percent restocking fee. I have many pair of fit flops. This pair did not fit, too tight. I should have paid more attention. A lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these fitflops , they are nice and classy. Im really happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: My second pair. Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my job as dental hygienist. Comfortable and the patent leather can be wiped as needed with sanitizing wipes that I use to wipe equipment and countertops in the operatory!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Love Fitflops!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes ever! I buy these to wear around the house and when we go on trips where a lot of walking is required. Because of the thick and soft soles, I can stand all day without feeling tired. I have like 15 pairs of fitflops and will not stop buying them.
customer_reviews.author: NewBabyMother

customer_reviews.title: Love these hot cherry FitFlops but so far only wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Able to wear with regular socks whereas my other pair of fit flop clogs need thicker socks because they are heavier.Love these hot cherry FitFlops but so far only wearing a couple of hours at a time to break them in. All my FitFlops are super comfortable and really help eliminate back pain.I don't know how I just noticed that when I put them on in the afternoon that my pain disappeared. Now I put them on first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. SMYLIE

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair pf these. My other 2 pairs are starting to wear after several years. I love these shoes because they are so easy to slip into, are attractive, and they ARE Fit Flops!! If you love Fit Flops like I do, you'll love these.
customer_reviews.author: margaret conlon

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Due to having “flat-feet”, I am only comfortable wearing FitFlop brand. I am in the medical field and stand for most of my shift. I have tried Dansko, Sanita and Anywhere clogs but find FitFlop clogs to be the best for me!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn  Giampaolo

customer_reviews.title: Really like them but am concerned they are fragile and succeptable ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore mules around the house a couple of days and wore them outside first time today. Really like them but am concerned they are fragile and succeptable to scuffing. Length is perfect. Width is larger than expected. Wore them about three hours today without any discomfort. I am also concerned about how long they'll hold up and remain looking great. Thus, I will not wear them everyday or all day. Love the patent leather and shoe design!
customer_reviews.author: DrShari

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! Although they look like galoshes under my jeans, but I love the color and the shine of the patented leather.
customer_reviews.author: YO

customer_reviews.title: Love Fitflops! This one little boxy in the toe area.
customer_reviews.text: Love Fitflops! This one little boxy in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for 2016 thus far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great mules for the weekends..my nurse loved them!! They run true to size n enhance my Fitbit walks...style, practical, healthy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Lewis -Quamina

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit as comfortably as expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as comfortably as expected. I purchased 3 other styles of FitFlops earlier in the year and they are now my happy shoes because I no longer have heel pain when I wear them. My disappointment with this shoe is because the patent leather top has cracked and split on the right shoe. I have only worn them as I usually do and not it bad weather etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfort and look!
customer_reviews.text: I love fitflop shoes! And these did not disappoint. I have an extremely high instep and worried about the fit. They fit wonderfully! I am quite happy! They offer comfort, support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Areford Reiley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR MY PLANTARS FASCIITIS
customer_reviews.text: Update. Ive been wearing them to work for the last 6mos and with all the heavy lifting and walking they're doing great. My fasciitis is about 98% better. I'm truly happy. Change the fabric used for the insole and it's a 5* product any day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Operating Room RN
customer_reviews.text: Fit larger than expected. Otherwise AWESOME clog. I got all my co-workers to buy a pair, too. I've had mine for 2 1/2 years and they are still very comfortable and supportive. Your legs/feet won't hurt while standing for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Greattt work or casual clogs!
customer_reviews.text: Shiney! Supportive cushy comfort great for lotsof worksteps n pivots. Shiney's Good! A bit ...sweaty...but they're clogs so.....
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many styles of Fitflops and have found this style to fit me the best. Styles differ in length and width, but this style is consistent to size. I have 3 pairs of this style and they are the only shoes I wear all fall and winter here in the southwest. :)
customer_reviews.author: Elaine in the northwest

customer_reviews.title: Love those fitflops!
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of fitflops and love them. So comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and peeled after just two months
customer_reviews.text: Looked very nice brand new, but after just two months of moderate wear (3 days a week) they’ve cracked and peeled at every seam. Absolutely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie.D

customer_reviews.title: Shoe cracked
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this purchase, the shoe cracked after only a month of wearing! (See pictures).I wish I can return them. I have previously purchased of the same shoes but different color and did not have any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this...light n sturdy..only when u wear them 12 hours..ur feet perspire..hut theyre so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Mata

customer_reviews.title: Comfort. My job requires walking so my shoes need to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are to large. 2-long, 2-wide. Can I exchange for a size 7? Thank you Jacqueline Trux
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Trux

customer_reviews.title: the best thing i have found in years
customer_reviews.text: these shoes/clogs are wonderful for people like me with chronic heel and knee pain. I put these on and I have painless walking. I have them in most colors and wear them almost 24/7. Love them. They last forever (have had one pair over 5 years now) and they always feel great
customer_reviews.author: J A  Pine

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair of the exact same shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable for someone like me who’s had six foot surgeries and still has foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: Genea Garry

customer_reviews.title: True 8
customer_reviews.text: Im an average width, I have purchased 8 before so I knew it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: nw

customer_reviews.title: A New Version of FitFlop Mules
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these shoes and wore them for several hours. However, the ball-areas of both feet behind my toes became extremely sore, despite the shoes fitting well. Perhaps I needed to "break in" the shoes, but that is not typical for my experience with FitFlops. I'll certainly try again to acclimate my feet to these shoes. I want them to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: Unable to wear the shoes, as they are really big. Will be returning them. Well-made product, I love the color, seems to have a good arch, and a nice solid foundation, but the size is too big. Shoes are not offered in half-sizes, only whole sizes, which probably contributes to the significant size difference.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: Love these just like all the other fitflop shoes I have first time for this style. Size is good. Color is absolutely lipstick red. Leather inside. Like the heel height. Makes feel a little taller. Will consider buying again depending on how these hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Lizajane

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and, OH, SO RED.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. They run large (a Fitflop US size 11 is EU 43 while most US size 11's are EU 42), but I plan to wear them in the winter with socks - and these will accommodate nice thick socks. These shoes are unbelievably comfortable. The color is fun - bright red.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: and they all feel great on my overworked and tired feet
customer_reviews.text: My feet have become so used to the comfort these shoes provide, I hardly want to wear anything else. I have 3 other pairs, and they all feel great on my overworked and tired feet. If you spend a lot of time walking, standing these will help with leg, and foot fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed cozy shoes during pregnancy.
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! I usually wear a 10-10.5, but I ordered these is size 11 to compensate for any foot swelling, since I'm 8 months pregnant. They are perfect! A little tight on the top but I can tell that they will contour to my feet the more I wear them. I got them in Indian Green and the color looks amazing! It's surprisingly neutral and goes with almost any color I choose to wear. Best shoes I've bought in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jalaika

customer_reviews.title: Comforting
customer_reviews.text: This product is very comfortable and has great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, I normally wear a wide and these fit my feet comfortably. I tried them on at the end of the day when my feet and ankles are swollen from arthritis. They felt great!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Be Happier😇
customer_reviews.text: I'm walking on sunshine, YEAH! Nicely mad, attention to detail, hidden closures of all ends of the stitching. Highly recommend if you have no arch under your feet. Oh and I love the color of course, my fav.....Green!
customer_reviews.author: British & Totally Bionic 🇬🇧

customer_reviews.title: Smaller fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8.5m. This style fits smaller than other 8M styles by Fit Flop. This is my 4th pair of FitFlops in a size 8M and I have worn the others a lot. My heel was almost coming off the back of this shoe. I kept it and plan to wear thin socks or none in warm weather. Otherwise I would have returned it. It took awhile to get used to it because it was stiff due to being patent leather and it wore a blister on one side but eventually it softened up and I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Sula Bay Trading

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these clogs. I have neuropathy in my feet so they keep me sturdy and balanced. Very comfortable for a full day. I wear a size 9 1/2 and got a size 10 with a little extra room. The colors are great. I have 3 pairs. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: MOJO

customer_reviews.title: I would not hesitate to recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box I wore these on a whirlwind trip from Seattle to Chicago, London, Budapest and Vienna, in winter no less! The were warm, waterproof and as with all FitFlops made it possible to walk all over up and down creation. I would not hesitate to recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gina PB

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit very comfortably, like the fit flops that I wear and love in the summer. However the patent leather splits anywhere there is a crease. It has also separated from the sole on the side, forcing the patent to crunch down and look very unattractive. I still wear them, but only around the house and would not recommend for such a high price.
customer_reviews.author: not my real name

customer_reviews.title: I love it but the one I have doesn't look like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the one I have doesn't look like the picture it is more flat with a slight wedge not a big wedge all over.
customer_reviews.author: marcy goldson

customer_reviews.title: Only shoes I wear
customer_reviews.text: I have other pairs of these and wanted a different color. It is a great shade of blue, not real dark. Fitflops are the only shoe and sandal that I wear year round. They are comfortable and look very stylish. I get lots of compliments on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Definitely a "wear all day" shoe. I usually wear an 8 1/2-9 and bought a 9. These fit more like an 8 1/2, but still an excellent fit. This pair fit slightly smaller than my other two pairs of Fitflops. Definitely want to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: cy

customer_reviews.title: if you are a 1/2 size, order down. ...
customer_reviews.text: if you are a 1/2 size, order down. It does run a bit wide, it would not work for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Deb, PNP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Uncomfortable. I own 15 pairs of Fitflops, sandals (slides and thongs) and boots and they are all fabulously comfortable. This is the only style that is not comfortable. Ended up wasting $100 and not wearing them. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Tova

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST shoes!!! They are very light, provide excellent arch support for my high arches and are very comfortable. I have bad knees and these shoes help me walk and stay on my feet longer. They are also a gorgeous cherry color. I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe this my 3rd pair of the shuv patent I have black, red and now navy no cracking however this pair ran larger than I normally wear no big deal I’m keeping them you might want to order a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Sassy galAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT shoes, but I have an extremely high arch & have a difficult time wearing clogs. These shoes have Great support. I have suede ones & they stretched with my foot. With Patent Leather they tend to keep their shape & not stretch. I wish I could have been able to keep these lovely shoes! Plus they are over $120 at Nordstroms & only approximately $70 here from Amazon!!!! Super Deal!!!! EJM
customer_reviews.author: Ejmarin31

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable clogs. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Used for grocery, running errands. Comfortable clogs. Well made. Will also use them for travel since they asked you to remove your shoes in the airport, might as well use this clogs for travel soon. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Really good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoes. I wear an 11.5 and the 11 fit perfectly. I'm a nurse and on my feet for 12-14 hours a day, and these are some of the best feeling shoes ever. They also hold up to spills and splashes; I've gotten various bodily fluids on them and they wipe off beautifully. These shoes are so wonderful, I even got my mother a pair!
customer_reviews.author: WendolynM

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, she loves them. She loves the comfort, the hight, the color. She puts them on the minute she gets home.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Melber

customer_reviews.title: This is a disappointment. Company says that no changes have been made ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought over 15 pair of Fitflops over the years. The inside of the shoe that makes contact with one's heel is not as soft as it used to be. This is a disappointment. Company says that no changes have been made to the manufacturing process of the inside but I disagree. These shoes are not comfortable for people suffering from plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.author: Agrumed

customer_reviews.title: Best work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for work in the hospital and they are perfect. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather cracking
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of FitFlops and have never had a problem before. I am so disappointed in these shoes. I have just started wearing them a few weeks ago and leather is cracking on both shoes. They look terrible! I cannot wear them. How upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I have a stand up desk at ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I have a stand up desk at work and these shoes are excellent. I can stand comfortably all day. I originally purchased them because I have flat feet and needed something that was low heel, but not flats. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An addiction!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cool looking..... Get many compliments...and my feet say thank you!!! Shiny leather in a cherry color red. Not a loud red... But works with almost everything!!! Have blue suede, orange suede, black, tan, and love them all!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: chocoholic

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to replace a previous pair of black patent ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a previous pair of black patent Van Gogh mules from FitFlop. They do not fit the same at all. Toe box is way smaller and my feet hurt an hour into my 12 hour shift. Haven't worn them since.
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyHeart

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: As usual FitFlop has made a wonderful shoe. You can walk for miles in this shoe. They do fit a little loose (width wise) but a thicker sock does the trick. They are a beautiful, high shine, patent leather and look great with pants or casual dresses or leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: I little tighter than normal.
customer_reviews.text: I always order a size 8, however these seem to squeeze my foot in the arch area, not the ball of my foot that is widest but closer up to the ankle. I still love them. I am hoping they will give a little.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn

customer_reviews.title: I got a gree "Ugly" color and look was clumsy ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a gree "Ugly" color and look was clumsy and orthopitic when you put them on. I returned ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, low rating
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this shoe! I bought too big, but wore anyway. My rating is because the parent leather cracked were your toes nend when you walk. One year I can understand, three months is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Tris Paniccia

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit smaller fit than usual for FitFlops, but not to bad. Your heal will be all the way to the back of the shoe. You can't really size up on FitFlops too much or your foot doesn't fit the footbed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. Very comfortable. I stand behind a chair for 8hrs a day doing hair. I have no leg aches! I get lots of compliments on the color!!! They are great. I don't wear anything other than fit flop
customer_reviews.author: jlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as comfortable as all my other FitFlops. Nothing is more comfortable on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: debbie chipman

customer_reviews.title: These shoes will crack within a matter of weeks
customer_reviews.text: Right shoe completely cracked all the way across the top. I will never buy Fit Flop shoes again. Too much money for an inferior product
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Picture made it look like patten leather
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. Picture made it look like patten leather.
customer_reviews.author: terry l richey

customer_reviews.title: Tight in the toe area... too wide ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight in the toe area ... too wide in the rest of the shoe ... have "walked" right out of them. I use them for "wet grass shoes", so I kept them, but cannot wear for shopping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CHN

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wear a women's size 8 normally, I got this in a 7 and it fits perfect. I love these, so comfy and cute, I've had so many complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected in length and width. However the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected in length and width. However the leather is so stiff it will take some time to break in where shoe rubs top of feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair in 5 years. I wear them everywhere. They can be both formal (patent) or informal and they are very comfortable. Great arch support too!
customer_reviews.author: Long time amazon user

customer_reviews.title: If you have foot issues...these are the shoes for you!
customer_reviews.text: Ok ladies, as a gal who stands on her feet daily as a cosmetolgist for the past 35 years and has feet issues. These are the shoes for you! I need a larger toe box, and arch support. These clogs has both! True to size. Crazy comfortable shoes that I would highly recommend! Bonus: super easy to clean, hair wipes right off them!!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Another winner from FitFlops
customer_reviews.text: I love FitFlops and this is another type of shoe from them. I've got sandals, boots, flats and now a clog. They are really comfortable. You can walk all day in them and you still have a spring in your step.
customer_reviews.author: EllesseB

product_meta.title: FitFlop Women's Shuv Patent Mule
product_meta.description: WE ARE FITFLOP. WEAR THE SHOES. RULE THE WORLD. At FitFlop, we believe that when your feet feel great, you feel like you can do anything. In 2006 FitFlop founder Marcia Kilgore set her mind on a mission – to create the most comfortable footwear in the world. Collaborating with two British biomechanists she created a triple-density MICROWOBBLEBOARD midsole, and launched it in our first FitFlop sandal. Over twenty million pairs have been sold since we first started making shoes. (And we’re repeatedly told – by happy customers – that we make the most comfortable footwear in the world.) Our patent-pending, original MICROWOBBLEBOARD midsole technology fuses three diagonal sections of multi-density EVA into a single, seamless, underfoot platform to help absorb shock, diffuse underfoot pressure, and make your feet feel amazing!
